level.text: Each person licensed as a private detective shall file in the Office of the Mayor, and shall keep in force throughout the duration of the license, a bond in the penal sum of five thousand dollars ($5,000), running to the District of Columbia and extending to third-party recovery, with corporate surety authorized by the D.C. Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs to do business in the District.
Each bond shall be conditioned as required by, and shall be subject to, the provisions of ยง 9(b) of Pub. L. 89-347 (D.C. Code ยง 4-171 (1981)).
